channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Cordless Stick Vacuum Throw Down: Bosch, Shark, Dyson (2026)
item.description: Bosch’s Unlimited 10 combines key features from Dyson’s and Shark’s stick vacuums and packs some nice extras, but it can’t seem to keep debris inside.

item.title: 12 top tech items I'd buy to host the best Super Bowl party — TVs, soundbars, appliances, drinks dispensers, speakers, games, and more
item.description: My guide to a selection of the top tech items worth buying if you're planning to host a Super Bowl party this year, including TVs, appliances, soundbars, games, and more.

item.title: Moins de 50 € en poche pour la fin des soldes ? Voici les 8 meilleurs deals sans se ruiner
item.description: À l’approche de la fin des soldes, les petits budgets ont encore la possibilité de se faire plaisir. Montres, écouteurs sans fil, accessoires pour smartphone, ou encore objets connectés : nous avons réuni une sélection de bons plans Tech à moins de 50 euros.

item.title: Best Mirrorless Cameras (2026): Full-Frame, APS-C, and More
item.description: Want the image quality of a DSLR without the bulk? These WIRED picks do more with less.

item.title: The 24 Best Movies on Amazon Prime, WIRED's Picks (February 2025)
item.description: Sinners, Wicked, and Die Hard are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Amazon Prime Video this week.

item.title: UFC 325 live stream: how to watch Volkanovski vs Lopes 2, start time, preview, full card
item.description: Featherweight Championship bout headlines packed card Down Under – follow our guide to live stream UFC 325 online and watch Volkanovski vs Lopes 2 from anywhere.

item.title: 6 new 4K Blu-rays from January 2026 to add to your collection
item.description: January 2026 has been a booming month for 4K Blu-ray, and we're looking at 6 new discs that you could add to your collection.

item.title: Highguard, a hyperpop arena shooter and other new indie games worth checking out
item.description: Welcome to our latest roundup of what's going on in the indie game space. There are tons of interesting games out this week. But first, there's been some discourse around the Nintendo Switch version of Dispatch, which arrived this week as well.On other platforms, there's an option to censor genitalia and other explicit content, but that's not present in the Switch version. Instead, such content is censored by default, with black rectangles covering up characters' bits and someone flipping the bird. Noises that suggest sexual pleasure are said to be toned down too."We worked with Nintendo to en...

item.title: Why a Tennessee proposal to ban sports betting on campus is too little, too late
item.description: States spent years rolling out the red carpet for online sportsbooks. Now lawmakers are attempting to cordon off an industry designed to be everywhere. In the months after a 2018 Supreme Court decision opened the door for states to legalize sports betting within their borders, giddy lawmakers across the country couldn’t move quickly enough. No one wanted to miss out on the billions of dollars in tax revenue that the high court had suddenly placed within their reach—or, worse yet, to watch that easy money go to neighboring states whose leaders had the presence of mind to move first. Within a mo...

item.title: 5 Best Touchscreen Gloves (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We braved the cold to answer a modern dilemma: Can you keep your hands warm and use a smartphone at the same time?

item.title: Jeffrey Epstein Had a ‘Personal Hacker,’ Informant Claims
item.description: Plus: AI agent OpenClaw gives cybersecurity experts the willies, China executes 11 scam compound bosses, a $40 million crypto theft has an unexpected alleged culprit, and more.

item.title: FiiO's new elite hi-res audio player will delight you, provided you serve it only the best –but disappoint it at your peril
item.description: In an effort to produce the best-sounding digital audio player you can buy, FiiO has gone to town, thrown the kitchen sink at it, and all the other actions that indicate a complete lack of compromise…

item.title: How the heck did phones become so boring? Looking at you, Apple and Samsung — but at least there’s hope on the horizon
item.description: Big phone makers should follow Nothing’s example of avoiding pumping out boring phones year after year.

item.title: Nvidia Shield TV software updates are going to keep coming – and we might even see a new device one day
item.description: Nvidia's Andrew Bell has been talking to Ars Technica about the present and the future of the Nvidia Shield TV.

item.title: The DJI Mini 5 Pro Fly More Combo is at a record-low price at Amazon — save $500 right now
item.description: The DJI Mini 5 Pro Fly More Combo is on sale at Amazon for $1,099, down from the normal price of $1,599. That's a 31% discount.

item.title: Clawdbot users are snapping up the Mac Mini — buy right now for under $550 at Amazon
item.description: The M4 Mac Mini is on sale at Amazon for $549, down from the normal price of $599.

item.title: Gear News of the Week: Samsung’s TriFold Sells Out in Minutes, and a Leak Teases Google’s New OS
item.description: Plus: Vivaldi browser shuns AI, Samsung has a new sustainable display, and Frankfurt Airport tests Auracast for gate announcements.

item.title: 'Extraordinary' Under Salt Marsh episode 2 scene 'wasn't scripted' reveals one star — and I dare you to not be moved
item.description: The first two episodes of Under Salt Marsh are now on Sky TV — and if one touching moment made you emotional, it's cast didn't even script it.

item.title: When to invest in your solo business
item.description: Nothing feels riskier for a solopreneur than investing money in your business when there’s no guarantee of an ROI. Here’s how to decide when to invest and when to save. Though I long resisted the label, I have been a solopreneur ever since I started working as a freelance writer in 2010. As the owner, manager, and only employee, all decisions about my solo freelancing business are up to me—which continues to feel simultaneously invigorating and terrifying....

item.title: Inside Apple’s Bad Bunny Super Bowl halftime show strategy
item.description: Forget Trump and the backlash! Apple’s halftime goal is to throw a global dance party. When Roc Nation and the NFL decided that Bad Bunny would be their Super Bowl headliner, the next step was for Apple, the show’s sponsor, to set the strategy to hype the halftime show.

item.title: Buyer’s or seller’s housing market? Zillow’s updated regional ratings for over 400 markets
item.description: Where home sellers—and homebuyers—have the most power right now, according to Zillow’s updated analysis released in January 2026. Want more housing market stories from Lance Lambert’s ResiClub in your inbox? Subscribe to the ResiClub newsletter.

item.title: Test du Epson EF-72 : un vidéoprojecteur Ultra HD LED compact, design et avec un son Bose
item.description: L’Epson EF-72 est un vidéoprojecteur compact monté sur un pied orientable misant sur le design, la simplicité via Google TV et le son Bose. Voici un test complet pour savoir s’il peut vraiment devenir votre écran principal.
